Posts.EditableText:
Yay!

I see ads on this site again!

Wait . . .  Did I just celebrate ads on a website?  Heck yeah I did!  Than means this site has some income rolling in again!  Whoo-hoo!

Posts.EditableText: They are a necessary evil. I hope they are here for good, and manowar has managed to resolve the issue!

Posts.EditableText: Actually, it looks like the site is more secure. The little padlock in the address line does not have a warning bar across it.
Posts.HTML: Actually, it looks like the site is more secure. The little padlock in the address line does not have a warning bar across it.

Posts.EditableText:
> Actually, it looks like the site is more secure.

You can visit secure and insecure versions of the site by typing (or bookmarking) the address with `http:` or `https:` at the beginning. So it's up to you if you use the site securely or not. This has been the case for quite a while.
